title: 99% Invisible-13x-Game Over (Snap Judgment)
description: 99% Invisible Extra! The tape rolls as we witness the tearful end of a perfect online world. This is a piece I did for Snap Judgment, based on a story from Robert Ashley’s brilliant A Life Well Wasted internet radio … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
